alert.note: Alert for Beauregard; Calcasieu; East Cameron; West Cameron (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 12:58AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Cameron, south central Beauregard and Calcasieu Parishes through 130 AM CDT... At 1258 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Mauriceville to Toomey to near Carlyss to Lake Charles to near Fenton. Movement was south at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Charles, Sulphur, Westlake, Vinton, Grand Lake, Lake Charles Regional Airport, Moss Bluff, De Quincy, Carlyss, Lunita, Buhler, Hacketts Corner, Heberts Marina, Lebleu Settlement, Gillis, Edgerly, Sweet Lake, Holmwood and Hackberry. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 6 and 40. Interstate 210 between mile markers 1 and 12. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Beauregard; Calcasieu; East Cameron; West Cameron
